title: FBI uses ANOM messaging app to trick criminals, dealing "heavy blow against organized crime"
content:
1. FBI uses ANOM messaging app to trick criminals, dealing "heavy blow against organized crime"  CBS News
  2. See how police tricked criminals with phone app trap  CNN
  3. FBI-led global crime bust leads to more than 800 arrests  CBS This Morning
  4. For years, the underworld thought its phones were safe. They fell for an encrypted app trap  CNN
  5. FBI app lures global criminals into police hands - BBC News  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: FBIがメッセージングアプリ「ANOM」を使って犯罪者を騙し、"組織犯罪に大打撃 "を与える
美国联邦调查局利用ANOM短信应用程序欺骗罪犯，对 "有组织犯罪给予沉重打击"
美國聯邦調查局利用ANOM短信應用程序欺騙罪犯，對 "有組織犯罪給予沉重打擊"
